Title: Breaking Zero Sales on Xiaohongshu
Content: Breaking zero sales on Xiaohongshu is crucial for increasing the order volume of your store or product. When a product is first listed, it has no sales or reviews, which can deter potential buyers. The goal of breaking zero sales is to boost initial sales and build credibility. This can be achieved by sharing the product link with friends and followers on platforms like WeChat, QQ, and Moments. Encourage them to place orders, which can later be refunded if necessary. This method helps create an initial sales record, making the product more appealing to new customers.

Title: Sharing Product Links Effectively
Content: To effectively share product links, avoid using QR codes or direct product searches, as these can be easily detected by the platform. Instead, share the product link through WeChat, QQ, or Moments. This method is less likely to be flagged and ensures that the product link reaches a wider audience. When sharing, make sure to explain the purpose and encourage friends to place orders. This helps in creating an initial sales record, which can significantly improve the product's visibility and attractiveness to potential buyers.

Title: Engaging Friends and Followers
Content: Engaging friends and followers is essential for breaking zero sales. Share the product link with your network and encourage them to place orders. Explain that the orders can be refunded later if necessary. This method helps create an initial sales record, making the product more appealing to new customers. Additionally, sharing the link in Xiaohongshu groups and with followers can further increase visibility. The key is to create a sense of urgency and importance, motivating your network to support your product launch.
